CustomField.description: Used to indicate if the indexation on the order is already applied to opportunity products or waived at opportunity level.
CustomField.formula: IF(TEXT(Opportunity.Type) = 'Existing Business-Renewal' && (Opportunity.Upcoming_Indexation_amount__c !=0 || TEXT(Opportunity.Waive_Indexation__c)= "First Year") && EffectiveDate < IF( AND( MONTH(Opportunity.Startdate_contract__c) = 2, DAY(Opportunity.Startdate_contract__c) = 29 ), DATE( YEAR(Opportunity.Startdate_contract__c) + 1, 3, 1), DATE( YEAR(Opportunity.Startdate_contract__c) + 1, MONTH(Opportunity.Startdate_contract__c), DAY(Opportunity.Startdate_contract__c)) ), true, false )
CustomField.label: Indexation added to Opp products/waived?
